original_text:
From the fruit of his mouth a man eats what is good,
    but the desire of the treacherous is for violence.
korean_text: 사람은 입의 열매로 인하여 복록을 누리거니와 마음이 궤사한 자는 강포를 당하느니라

sentences.original_text: From the fruit of his mouth
a man eats what is good
but the desire of the treacherous is for violence
